text:
, ___ • ^ _
List of stations recommended for visit by John Macy
WETA, Washington, D. C., William McCarter, Manager
McCarter is an ETS Board Member, and Washington, D. C.
is the home of CPB Board members Joseph Beirne and
Jack Valenti.
WNDT, WNYE, WNYC, New York City,
WNDT's manager is Jack Keirmaier
WNYE's manager is James Macandrew
WNYC - Seymour Seigel
New York City is the home of CPB Board members
Robert Benjamin, John D. Rockefeller and Frank Pace
KCET - Los Angeles, James Loper, manager.
Los Angeles is the home of Roscoe Carroll, CPB Board
member.
WSBE-TV, Providence, Rhode Island, manager Robert Danielowicz.
Providence is home for CPB Board member Michael Gammino.
KUHT, Houston, Texas, manager Roy Barthold. KUHT is the first
ETV station in the United States, and is the home of CPB Board
Member, Mrs. Oveta Culp Hobby.
KCTS, Seattle, Washington, Loren Stone, manager. Loren Stone
is of course an ETS Board Member and also Seattle is the
home of Sol Haas, CPB Board member.
WQED, Pittsburgh, Donald Taverner, manager, and home of CPB
Board Member, Joseph Hughes.
WGBH, Boston, Hartford Gunn, manager, Hartford Gunn is the
Chairman of the ETS Board, and Boston is the home of CPB
Board members, Dr. James Killian and Erich Leinsdorf.
Atlanta, Georgia, WETV and the Georgia ETV network plus nearby
Athens, Georgia, WGTV. Managers are Richard Oettinger for
the Georgia ETV network, Gilbert Tauffner for WETV and
William Hale for WGTV. Atlanta is the home of CPB Board
Mertiber, Carl Sanders.1
WILL-TV, Urbana, Illinois, Frank Schooley, manager and CPB
Board member.
WKNO, Memphis, Howard Holst, manager, ETS Director.
WHYY-WUHY, Philadelphia-Wilmington, Warren Kraetzer, ETS Director*
WITjr-TV, Hershey, Pennsylvania,, Lloyd Kaiser, ETS Director.
